p: Only four hybrid non-ribosomal peptide synthetase-polyketide synthases (NRPS-PKS) were predicted, one of the hybrid BGCs from Klebsiella sp. ME86 possessed similarity to the yersiniabactin BGC, while the remaining three of these represented uncharacterised BGCs. Additional known BGCs identified in the endophyte genomes included the lassopeptide genes responsible for lichenicidin synthesis in Bacillus sp. ME35, and the NRPS required for acinetobactin synthesis in Acinetobacter sp. ME27. The majority of endophyte derived BGCs lacked homology to known specialised metabolite BGCs using the MiBIG database (Medema et al. 2015) via antiSMASH (Blin et al. 2017) that was applied.
